unnormalised: **Brand Collaborations Heat Up Social Media This Festive Season!**
normalised: **Brand Collaborations Heat Up Social Media This Festive Season!**

unnormalised: Hey fam! It's that time of year again, and your Insta feed is probably already exploding with brand collaborations, right? This Onam, everyone from your favorite fashion influencers in Delhi to food bloggers in Kerala are teaming up with brands to bring you the best deals and content.
normalised: Hey fam! It's that time of year again, and your Insta feed is probably already exploding with brand collaborations, right? This Onam, everyone from your favorite fashion influencers in Delhi to food bloggers in Kerala are teaming up with brands to bring you the best deals and content.

unnormalised: We're seeing some seriously creative pairings! Remember Priya Sharma, the fitness guru? She’s now collaborating with Haldiram’s to promote healthier snacking options around biryani cravings – who knew!
normalised: We're seeing some seriously creative pairings! Remember Priya Sharma, the fitness guru? She’s now collaborating with Haldiram’s to promote healthier snacking options around biryani cravings – who knew!

unnormalised: Industry experts are saying this surge is fueled by the increasing reach of regional influencers. Small businesses in cities like Lucknow are also leveraging micro-influencers to reach hyper-local audiences.
normalised: Industry experts are saying this surge is fueled by the increasing reach of regional influencers. Small businesses in cities like Lucknow are also leveraging micro-influencers to reach hyper-local audiences.

unnormalised: Even IIM Ahmedabad is reportedly studying the impact of influencer marketing on consumer behavior this quarter.
normalised: Even I I M Ahmedabad is reportedly studying the impact of influencer marketing on consumer behavior this quarter.

unnormalised: Expect to see more collaborations focusing on authenticity and relatable content. Forget glossy ads – consumers want real recommendations from people they trust. Brands are dishing out Rs. 50,000 to Rs. 5 Lakh for single campaign. The competition is intense, and you might even find a hidden gem offering a 25% off coupon for that new saree you've been eyeing. So, keep an eye out!
normalised: Expect to see more collaborations focusing on authenticity and relatable content. Forget glossy ads – consumers want real recommendations from people they trust. Brands are dishing out rupee fifty thousand to rupee five lakh for single campaign. The competition is intense, and you might even find a hidden gem offering a twenty five percent off coupon for that new saree you've been eyeing. So, keep an eye out!
